alert.note: Alert for Clinch; Echols (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 5:46PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Echols, Atkinson and northwestern Clinch Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 546 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from near Willacoochee to 8 miles northwest of I-75 At Exit 16 to 8 miles south of Boston. Movement was east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Homerville, Pearson, Argyle, Du Pont, Mayday, Cogdell and Axson. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for southeastern Georgia. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for southeastern Georgia.
